response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "high", "Being 20 years old falls in a high-risk age group for criminal behavior"],
    ["Prior arrest", "low", "Only one arrest with no convictions suggests limited criminal history"],
    ["Education", "medium", "Has GED but no further education, indicating moderate educational achievement"],
    ["Employment instability", "high", "4 jobs in one year shows significant employment instability"],
    ["Drug use", "high", "History of multiple drug use including cocaine indicates substance abuse risk"],
    ["Living situation", "medium", "Not living alone and large childhood household could indicate unstable housing"],
    ["Early life factors", "medium", "Urban environment and large household size may have created risk factors"],
    ["Mental health", "low", "No reported depression is a positive indicator"],
    ["Social support", "medium", "Never married and non-religious beliefs may indicate lower social support"]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: Being 20 years old falls in a high-risk age group for criminal behavior
Only one arrest with no convictions suggests limited criminal history
Has GED but no further education, indicating moderate educational achievement
4 jobs in one year shows significant employment instability
History of multiple drug use including cocaine indicates substance abuse risk
Not living alone and large childhood household could indicate unstable housing
Urban environment and large household size may have created risk factors
No reported depression is a positive indicator
Never married and non-religious beliefs may indicate lower social support

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 0 inches and weighs 204 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 4 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
